cinnamon.engine.object

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.object.Solver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Subsystem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IterativeSolver

    public abstract class Solver
extends Object
implements Subsystem

    Base class for a fixed step physics solver to move BodyComponents through physics computations.
